name: Clean Freak
description:
Clean Freak is a small game about a dog named Derples trying to stop the Master's new Droomba from hurting itself. 

The Droomba goes in haphazard directions on a whim, and can easily break from any falling object, fall from a high place, or getting wet. You can use your body to protect it from harm like a cartoon!

Keep in mind that Master expects the house to be clean, so you have to do that as well, get your broom and sweep up the mess! But you can't protect the Droomba while carrying the broom! 

Try to find out how to prioritize cleanliness and protectiveness in this little experiment.

All programming, level design and animation done by Jaime Echeverría (RPGgrenade)
